meanings.definition: Exciting or stirring up emotions or enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: The rousing music at the concert got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: The team's rousing victory brought cheers from the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The rousing speech made even the sleepiest person feel energized.
meanings.sent4: Her rousing performance on stage was like a burst of energy.
meanings.sent5: The rousing sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Causing someone to wake up or become alert.
meanings.sent1: The rousing alarm clock startled him awake.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh coffee was a rousing start to the morning.
meanings.sent3: The rousing rooster crowed loudly, waking up the whole farm.
meanings.sent4: The rousing thunderstorm outside made it impossible to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The rousing smell of bacon cooking made her jump out of bed.
